name: Diet Sprint
description:
My first game that I've uploaded on itch.io, it's really janky. 

This game is about being healthy. 

You have to dodge bad foods and consume good ones.

Here's a list of the good and bad ones:

Bad:

Candy Cane: Full of sugar, kind of bad

Pizza: Oil and trans fat, very bad

Hamborger: Same thing as pizza, although you lost more HP

Good:

Apple: An apple a day keeps the doctor away, adds a tiny amount of HP

Berries: They're really good, and delicious

Milk: Ultimate Beverage, superior to OJ. Calcium brings you to full energy
